EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of CCXI.OQ conference call or presentation 21-Dec-20 9:30pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
ChemoCentryx Inc and Vifor Fresenius Medical Care Renal Pharma Corporate Update Call to Discuss Results from Topline Data from the ACCOLADE Clinical Study
Bern Dec 22, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of ChemoCentryx Inc conference call or presentation Monday, December 21, 2020 at 9:30:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript
